abstract: The proposed overhaul of American financial regulations should reduce the extent of risk-taking by the biggest banks and may bolster their credit ratings.
snippet: The proposed overhaul of American financial regulations should reduce the extent of risk-taking by the biggest banks and may bolster their credit ratings.
lead_paragraph: The proposed overhaul of American financial regulations should reduce the extent of risk-taking by the biggest banks and may bolster their credit ratings, Fitch Ratings said Friday, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Fitch Expects Financial Overhaul to Cut Bank Risks
